description: Two boys are arrested after a pair of 15-year-olds were stabbed in Birmingham on Tuesday night.
title: Teenagers arrested after two boys stabbed
title_page: Teenagers arrested after two boys stabbed in Birmingham - BBC News
maintext:
Two teenagers have been arrested after a pair of 15-year-old boys were stabbed in Birmingham.
Police were called to Cole Bank Road just after 15:30 GMT on Tuesday.
One of the victims had suffered a knife wound to the back while the other was stabbed in the arm. They were taken to hospital with injuries not believed to be life-threatening.
Two boys, aged 16 and 18, were arrested on Tuesday night on suspicion of wounding with intent, and remain in custody. A knife has been recovered as part of the investigation.
